Class Table

java.lang.Object
com.dnikitin.poker.game.Table
public class Table extends Object
The central engine of a single Poker game instance.

Architecture (Facade Pattern): This class acts as a Facade that coordinates lower-level components:

  • Dealer - Card distribution.
  • PotManager - Chip management.
  • TurnOrder - Player sequencing.
  • HandEvaluator - Rule enforcement.

Concurrency (Thread Safety): Since multiple com.dnikitin.poker.server.ClientHandler threads interact with the table simultaneously, all state-mutating methods are protected by a ReentrantLock. This ensures atomic state transitions and prevents race conditions (e.g., two players acting out of turn simultaneously).

State Machine: The table transitions through strictly defined phases (GameState), ensuring valid game flow (e.g., preventing betting during the dealing phase).

  • Constructor Details

    • Table

      public Table(GameFactory gameFactory)
      Creates a new Table with specific rules provided by the factory.
      Parameters:
      gameFactory - Factory providing deck, evaluator, and config (Dependency Injection).

  • Method Details

    • addObserver

      public void addObserver(GameObserver observer)
      Registers a new observer to receive game events. Thread-safe.
      Parameters:
      observer - The listener (typically a client handler).

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(Player player)
      Adds a player to the table. Allowed only if the game is in LOBBY state and table is not full.

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Starts the game loop. Validates minimum player count.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()

    • playerCheck

      public void playerCheck(Player player)
      Processes a player's request to CHECK.

      Validation: 1. Is it the betting phase? 2. Is it this player's turn? 3. Does the current bet equal the player's bet? (If not, Check is illegal).

      Parameters:
      player - The acting player.
      Throws:
      InvalidMoveException - if the move violates poker rules.

    • playerCall

      public void playerCall(Player player)

    • playerRaise

      public void playerRaise(Player player, int raiseAmount)

    • playerFold

      public void playerFold(Player player)

    • playerExchangeCards

      public void playerExchangeCards(Player player, List<Integer> indexesToDiscard)
      Processes a player's request to EXCHANGE cards (Draw phase).
      Parameters:
      player - The acting player.
      indexesToDiscard - Indices of cards to remove from hand.
      Throws:
      IllegalDrawException - if the deck runs out of cards.

    • playerDisconnect

      public void playerDisconnect(Player player)
